info.name: Listings Finder API
info.description: This is an Express.js API that uses sample data from MongoDB

item.name: Returns a sample of the first 10 records from the sample AirBnB Listing database.

response.name: Successful Operation

            "host_location": "Istanbul, Turkey",

        },
        "reviews": [
            {
                "_id": "4208789",
                "date": "2013-04-18T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "2561998",
                "reviewer_name": "Lara",
                "comments": "Osman's apartment was comfortable and nicely situated. The apartment is rather equipped like a hotel suit but Osman is very helpful and he will surely try to accommodate if you have additional requests (he bought a new iron as I have needed one). I think this apartment is a perfect alternative to a hotel in order to get a excellent location and good decoration for a reasonable price."
            },
            {
                "_id": "4286343",
                "date": "2013-04-24T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "4158608",
                "reviewer_name": "Максим",
                "comments": "Хорошее жильё за свои деньги. Двуспальная кровать в спальне и раскладывающийся диван в гостиной. Хороший выбор для бюджетного проживания семьёй. Находится недалеко от площади Таксим и улицы Истикляль, ориентир для таксистов — немецкая больница. В то же время немного в удалении, значит не будет толп туристов под окнами. Прямо в апартамент можно приехать на лифте — весьма необычно. Хозяин вполне доброжелателен."
            },
            {
                "_id": "4714667",
                "date": "2013-05-21T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "3320354",
                "reviewer_name": "Дмитрий",
                "comments": "Впервые попробовал снять квартиру вместо гостиницы. Выбрал квартиру Османа - очень понравилось. По деталям, очень близко от метро Таксим - минут пять пешком. До Истикляль можно дойти минут за 6-8. Если пойти вниз от квартиры мимо больницы немецкого посольства, то до трамвая всего минут 15 ходьбы. В доме 6 этажей, лифт имеется. Подъезд закрывается на ключ и в маленькой коморке в подвальчике обязательно кто-то дежурит из людей Османа. Рядом с домом есть супермаркет CARREFOUR, что очень хорошо. Пару раз дергал Османа просьбами - он всегда помогал. В квартире 2 кондиционера ,  посуда, вайфай, тв, чайник и тд. рекомендую!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "4995495",
                "date": "2013-06-06T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "5949299",
                "reviewer_name": "Maryam",
                "comments": "My family enjoyed staying in Osman's flat. Osman is very helpful, kind and communicative person. Although the flat is smaller than what you see in the pictures but it was clean and tidy and comfortable enough to stay."
            },
            {
                "_id": "5319779",
                "date": "2013-06-24T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "6583323",
                "reviewer_name": "Ilze",
                "comments": "Apartment is in very good location in Taksim area! It is located in calm small street, but not far from Istacle street and the square, where airport shuttle buses are arriving. There is also supermarket just around the corner. So very convenient! We had everything we needed in the apartment, but don't expect 5star hotel :) It is cosy home atmosphere. There are some problem in shower as water is passing by and getting on floor, but otherwise all is good :) Thank's for Osman and his team! Osman was very responsive, when I had some doubts due to not calm situation in Taksim square. Luckily all was good :) I can for sure recommend Osman and his apartments as home out of home :) "
            },
            {
                "_id": "5918865",
                "date": "2013-07-22T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "2337383",
                "reviewer_name": "Fynn",
                "comments": "There was 4 of us staying in this luxury apartment in Istanbul. We were there during the end of the protesting but we felt so safe the whole time. Our host and landlord Osman cannot be faulted. He was there for any of out needs and questions and was continuously welcoming and friendly during out stay. I will be returning in the future and could not imagine a better place to stay. The area of the apartment was perfect. A stone throw away from the main street and taxsim square and a 5 minute walk to kabatas. I couldn't think of a better place to stay if your a family or a young group like we were. I cannot recommend this more. THANK YOU OSMAN"
            },
            {
                "_id": "6118510",
                "date": "2013-07-30T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "7608188",
                "reviewer_name": "Mathew",
                "comments": "Very nice and simple apartment in a great location about 5 mins walk from Taksim Square. Everything was great and Osman was helpful! Only issue was the wifi in the apartment which was poor."
            },
            {
                "_id": "7099970",
                "date": "2013-09-06T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "8135017",
                "reviewer_name": "Frank",
                "comments": "Our stay in stay in Istanbul at Osmans place was very nice, the apartment was very clean and looked as described.\r\n\r\nThe location is very good, very central and you can reach the public transport easily too.\r\n\r\nBesides that Osman is a very kind and helpful guy."
            },
            {
                "_id": "7246011",
                "date": "2013-09-13T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "7514355",
                "reviewer_name": "Яна",
                "comments": "Стамбул произвёл на нас отличное впечатление и квартирка Османа не стала исключением. Её расположение позволило нам очень быстро добраться от площади Таксим,но она находится немножко вглубине, поэтому шум улиц нас совсем не беспокоил. Единственным неудобством было то, что вход в душевую проходит через одну из комнат. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "7398352",
                "date": "2013-09-18T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "1199298",
                "reviewer_name": "Marta",
                "comments": "Thank you Osman, your apartments are lovely and in a great location.  Easy walking to Taxim square (10 min) and downhill and across the bridge to the Old city (35 min).  Apartments are clean and well furnished.  \r\nOsman took great care of us.  Because the person before us had not checked out from our room when we arrived, Osman placed us in a different room, then moved us to a top floor penthouse for our second night. The view from the roof top suite the second night was fantastic. Osman was very responsive and easy to work with.  I highly recommend staying in his apartments when in Istanbul. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "7829004",
                "date": "2013-10-05T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "8059770",
                "reviewer_name": "Cherian",
                "comments": "Osman was a great host! My friends and I arrived early and we did wait a few minutes but Osman and his friend Rejup were really helpful. The location is perfect - close enough to taxsim, but not too close and loud. \r\n\r\nWould stay here again if i'm in istanbul"
            },
            {
                "_id": "8217431",
                "date": "2013-10-21T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "3814678",
                "reviewer_name": "Xiaomei",
                "comments": "Osman's place was great! I enjoyed the stay very much."
            },
            {
                "_id": "8482086",
                "date": "2013-11-02T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "8077133",
                "reviewer_name": "Laura",
                "comments": "Osman est une personne très agréable et serviable. Il a fait son maximum pour que nous nous sentions bien dans son appartement.\r\nL'immeuble où il a les appartements est bien situé dans Taksim. Il y a cependant un bar à proximité et on entendait souvent du bruit la nuit (pour les personnes dormant dans le salon). La chambre était calme. L'appartement était propre.\r\nEn revanche, lorsque j'avais réservé (pour 5), je ne pensais pas que nous dormirerions sur des matelas pneumatiques. Nous en avons parlé à Osman qui a arrangé la situation et nous a donné deux appartements. Nous avons eu à changer 3 fois de chambre et c'est un peu dommage ! \r\nMais ça reste une bonne expérience. Appartement à recommander plutôt pour 2 ou 3 personnes !"
            },
            {
                "_id": "8740251",
                "date": "2013-11-15T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "9141453",
                "reviewer_name": "Martina",
                "comments": "We were stying 5 girls in this apartment. We enjoyed our stay so much. Osman was very friendly. the kitchen and bathroom were small for 5 of us. Anyway we didnt need to cook since there are lot of opportunities to eat outside. Sleeping was comfortable for each of us, Osman provided us after request with extra blanket so that we didnt have to sleep under one for couples. The apartment provided also free Wifi which was working great and there was also hair dryer which we apreciated a lot. We would definitely recommend this appartment to our friends. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "8813371",
                "date": "2013-11-19T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "3513099",
                "reviewer_name": "Denise",
                "comments": "We really loved staying at Osman's place! It was hidden from d main road but yet steps away from Taksim Square. Super quiet at nite n thts what we wanted, a peaceful sleep. \r\n\r\nIts a really clean apartment. No problem wth getting food, near to the subway n bus terminals. \r\n\r\nOsman was very helpful esp with our luggages n easy going host. Next trip to Istanbul, we will definetly be staying there again.\r\n\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "8955701",
                "date": "2013-11-28T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "9039198",
                "reviewer_name": "Jung Wook",
                "comments": "I love staying at Osman's place. It was close to the Taksim area where exciting events are going on! He was kind and nice to us. I wish I could stay in Istanbul longer and definitely go to Osman's place when I visit Istanbul! Moreover, the shuttle service from airport was cheaper than I expected. It costs me $35 US dollar from his place to the Ataturk airport! \r\n\r\nThanks for great memory Osman"
            },
            {
                "_id": "9023256",
                "date": "2013-12-02T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "6477117",
                "reviewer_name": "Jan Willem",
                "comments": "Greatly enjoyed our stay in Istanbul and this place was the ideal base for is. Around the corner of Taksim square and near all the nice cafes. Would definitely recommend it!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "9085113",
                "date": "2013-12-05T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "10265699",
                "reviewer_name": "Adam",
                "comments": "It was a great time in Istambul, the flat was clean and correct, the location is perfect. Osman is a very good host, it is highly recommended flat."
            },
            {
                "_id": "9190100",
                "date": "2013-12-12T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "2234692",
                "reviewer_name": "Roberto",
                "comments": "Osman is a great host! Always available and supportive! The flat is simply perfect, both in terms of position and itself! Great experience!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "9394451",
                "date": "2013-12-26T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1038163",
                "reviewer_id": "9948937",
                "reviewer_name": "Patricia",
                "comments": "Overall our stay was very nice... everything was clean. Es gibt unzählige nette Bars und Restaurants in der Nähe, man kann von dort aus gut zu Fuss los oder die Metro nutzen. Obwohl wir abends erst sehr spät ankamen hatte man uns ein Taxi organisiert, welches uns direkt zur Wohnung brachte. Auch als wir so spät noch auf die Suche nach den nächsten Kneipen gingen bekamen wir Hilfe.\r\nInsgesamt war es überhaupt kein Problem nach irgendetwas zu fragen, Osman war immer hilfsbereit und freundlich!\r\nAuch mit der Wohnungsausstattung waren wir zufrieden. Die Wohnung ist nicht besonders gross, war aber auch für 4 Leute absolut ausreichend und an Sauberkeit fehlte es auch nicht."

                "comments": "L'appartement est très bien situé à deux pas de la place Taksim et de tous les autres lieux touristiques.             {
                "_id": "5520018",
                "date": "2013-07-03T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "992224",
                "reviewer_name": "Zach",
                "comments": "I had the greatest time here. First of all, what a cool experience. If you are into lush rainforests, organic fruits/veggies/nuts growing on-site, and stellar landscaping - than this is your place. The room is very very nice and the property is super cool. The donkey, Mocha, is fun to see work his magic and the house puppy is really cute. Meanwhile, Sherry is a great host who gave me a very thorough intro to organic farming and a lot of encouragement to get starred myself. Highly recommend this place. NOTE - be sure to follow Sherry'a directions here and NOT (Hidden by Airbnb) /apple maps. Your tires will thank you!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "26731727",
                "date": "2015-02-18T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "23453965",
                "reviewer_name": "Thomas",
                "comments": "Wir waren 3 Tage bei Sherri in ihrem schönen, grünen Garten. Das Zimmer ist eigentlich eine kleine Wohnung, man hat genügend Platz für alles. Die Einrichtung ist bunt zusammengewürfelt, man merkt Sherri´s Liebe zum Detail. In der Nacht hört man ein buntes Tierstimmen-Gemisch, das sollte man erlebt haben. (Für den Fall, dass es zu laut ist, hat Sherri Kopfhörer und Ohropax bereitgelegt.) Ansonsten hat man es bei Sherri sehr ruhig, weil ihr Grundstück abseits der Verkehrsrouten liegt.\r\nDas einzige Wermutstropfen ist, dass das Zimmer nicht sauber war- hier wäre ein gründlicher Frühjahrsputz angebracht."
            },
            {
                "_id": "26891007",
                "date": "2015-02-21T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "18222155",
                "reviewer_name": "Michael",
                "comments": "Sherri had a warm Aloha welcome when we arrived!! The property was as described. It's definitely \"shabby Chic\" but very clean & comfy.\r\nLoved the great bed!!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "30687725",
                "date": "2015-04-26T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "19299564",
                "reviewer_name": "Windy",
                "comments": "Sherri's place is very magical & grounding & we enjoyed our several days here. Unfortunately, we were on the run visiting a sick family member & never got to really visit or talk. \r\nWe loved the night time noises, but realize it wouldn't be for everyone. \r\nThe grounds are beautiful, we only wished we had more time to explore! We thought the location was good, in a beautiful neighborhood. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "42369125",
                "date": "2015-08-12T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "41033131",
                "reviewer_name": "Simon",
                "comments": "Sherry our host is an amazing person. Her place in the middle of the jungle is a little paradise if you like animals. The place is filled with her art and her heart. It was an amazing stay at her place. We thank her a lot."
            },
            {
                "_id": "42497490",
                "date": "2015-08-13T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "2647915",
                "reviewer_name": "Taylor",
                "comments": "pure magic! sherri was a lovely host & we were thrilled upon meeting our welcoming party of ducks, a chicken, & a sweet pup oh & of course the donkey! the cottage was so cozy & had lots of charm & character. an inspiring space & felt like home. sherri stocked us up with a lovely breakfast spread & gave us a tour of the property & we talked story. highly recommended, will love to visit again soon :) aloha"
            },
            {
                "_id": "44202492",
                "date": "2015-08-24T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "3074169",
                "reviewer_name": "Paula",
                "comments": "Airbnb is so fabulous!  Instead of staying in a sterile hotel, I was able to meet Sherrie and see what life in the jungle is like and enjoy all of her delightful animals!  If you are an animal lover, this is the place to go.  It's a bit remote (bring a prepared dinner with you because you won't want to leave once you're there), but the upstairs room is so wonderful to be in, three sides with windows that look out into the garden and the palm trees.  It has a real tree house feel to it.  Sherrie showed me how to feed papaya peels to the donkey, and Mr. Chris, the cat, bounded in the door when I opened it and spent the nights with me on the king-size bed, which was a treat for me.  If you are an adventurer and love being in open air, with the sounds of frogs at night, this is a wonderful stop just outside of Hilo and Keaau."
            },
            {
                "_id": "57907367",
                "date": "2015-12-30T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "14907909",
                "reviewer_name": "Mayra",
                "comments": "We really had a wonderful time at Sherri's gardens. Her place is so full of life and great energy! Her attention to detail made our stay pleasant and unforgettable. She left fruit and goodies for breakfast which we truly appreciated and really enjoyed. Her place at night is surrounded by the sound of nature and peace. We look forward to coming back!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "60780702",
                "date": "2016-01-27T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "53504436",
                "reviewer_name": "Neil",
                "comments": "Beautiful apartment on beautiful land in Keaau (Puna district).    The apartment was spacious, cool, relaxed, and the art was a lovely touch!  The garden was lush and the animals were really cute.  The night sounds were great, although some people may be more sensitive to it (Sherri has provided earplugs if that turns out to be the case).\r\n\r\nSherri is an extremely welcoming host and did everything to make us feel comfortable.  We were welcomed to the place but then left in complete privacy.  When we had a question, she was extremely quick to respond and accommodating in every way."
            },
            {
                "_id": "60967363",
                "date": "2016-01-30T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "10027577",
                "reviewer_name": "Jem",
                "comments": "Animal lovers rejoice! Sherri is very friendly and her place is amazing. We fed the ducks and befriended all her (Website hidden by Airbnb) 2 year old daughter loved it. Thanks Sherri for everything!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "63494826",
                "date": "2016-02-23T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "17344353",
                "reviewer_name": "Kristen",
                "comments": "Sherri is a fantastic host.  She lives a little off the beaten path so you get a real local feel whole still being close to everything.  Sherri was so sweet and welcoming and really made us feel comfortable. She has a donkey and goat and adorable little critters that you can play with and it was a lovely experience. We unfortunately had a travel issue and had to depart early but in our short stay it was clear Sherri has a little slice of heaven in paradise.  The attached apartment has everything you need and Sherri has put her own artistic touch on the place.  It is spacious for 2 people and just a short ride to downtown Hilo. Would definitely stay again."
            },
            {
                "_id": "122743445",
                "date": "2016-12-25T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "1753860",
                "reviewer_name": "Gelena",
                "comments": "Pros:\n1) Many animals (donkey, rabbits, ...). Very interesting for someone like me who spends life in offices/apartments.\n2) Like your own world. No people around.\n3) Beautiful nature. There are many windows in bedroom, it's possible to imagine that you are sleeping in jungle.\n4) Close to Hilo, Volcanoes National Park.\nPros/cons: \n1) I like to sleep listening sounds of nature: rain, birds singing and so on. But the second person in our party used earplugs provided by Sherri. So it depends on you if this is pros or cons.\n\nNeed to mention: the road is unpaved. We rented SUV, so no problems at all. But I think, that \"smaller\" cars are suitable as well."
            },
            {
                "_id": "132588830",
                "date": "2017-02-18T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "26288531",
                "reviewer_name": "Ursula",
                "comments": "It was very nice staying with Sherri. We loved  the bed in the jungle and the animals, especially the donkey. It  was cozy and relaxing, like being at home. We miss the donkey who greeted us every day and did a summersault for us to get  carrots. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "176848332",
                "date": "2017-08-01T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "4707325",
                "reviewer_name": "Nicolas",
                "comments": "We had a lovely time staying on Sherri's beautiful property. It is a real jungle paradise! The animals were very friendly and great to wake up to."
            },
            {
                "_id": "224939013",
                "date": "2018-01-04T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "9407200",
                "reviewer_name": "Sharon",
                "comments": "Truly an \"Enchanted Garden\".  If you want to get away and into a beautiful garden, this is the place for you.  When you sit on the outside veranda, there is a myriad of color and life that surrounds you.  A little off the beaten path, but well worth it."
            },
            {
                "_id": "227443642",
                "date": "2018-01-14T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "156685381",
                "reviewer_name": "Katrina",
                "comments": "If you are looking to see the natural side of Hawaii Island, be in the rainforest, and rest in a safe, clean, beautiful and eco- friendly home-- book with Sherri!!! Sherri is a true artist, her art is everywhere around the property from the floor to the ceilings and outside.  Everything is so pretty and dream-like so \"Enchanted gardens\" is fitting. Little touches throughout the home really tie everything together. the property is somewhat remote but only a short drive to town, the beach, and Volcano national park. You get the perks of being surrounded in rainforest and privacy but still get convenience, wifi, and hot water. \nSherri was so helpful with anything we needed; she shared her art supplies with me and loaned us snorkel equipment and pool noodles after telling us the best spots on the island. \nSherri and the animals were all sweet hearts. My favorite was the lovable pup, the friendly donkey and the happy chickens walking about the yard. She provided fresh fruit daily and offered us any fruit growing on the property. She even gave me a beautiful bouquet to take home with me. It was wonderful! \nMy fiancé and I decided to get married on the big island, and we TRULY could not have had a better time or stayed anywhere better. Great for couples who want to adventure but have somewhere beautiful to come home to! Enjoy your trip, book Sherri!!!!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "228662894",
                "date": "2018-01-20T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "1635866",
                "reviewer_name": "Jason",
                "comments": "Stayed at this delightful jungle bungalow for five days.  Located in the rain  forest outside of Hilo, it's a bit of a drive to get there but worth it for the quiet and intense green vegetation that surrounds the place.  The rain was constant  - at least during our stay - but it's not cold, just cool.  The house itself is funky and full of Sherri's handicrafts, art and artifacts.  Sherri was a great and understanding host as well.  Would love to come back next time!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "301799092",
                "date": "2018-08-04T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1067052",
                "reviewer_id": "25120623",
                "reviewer_name": "Adrian",
                "comments": "Amazing value. Spacious bedroom and living area, beautiful views of the surrounding forest from the second floor.  Very peaceful because the unit doesn't share any walls, ceilings, or floors with anyone else.  We loved falling asleep to the sounds of the forest and the rain. Sherri has created a unique and beautiful paradise here.  All of the animals are charming, especially the donkey.  If you stay on a Wednesday, be sure to visit Uncle Robert's Night Market for live music, food, and a great view of the glow from Kilauea.  Sherri was extremely responsive and accomodating. "
            }

            {
                "_id": "286908",
                "date": "2011-05-29T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "494398",
                "reviewer_name": "Isfahan",
                "comments": "We stayed in the brownstone for 4 nights and had a lovely time.  The apartment was spacious enough for us (a family of four) and the location was amazing.  You are steps to Central Park and to the 86th subway.  There are wonderful restaurants and shopping nearby if you need that but the small kitchen is fine for quick snacks and breakfast.  It was especially nice to sit on the little patio to eat my toast and tea and even with the NYC humming around you it is lovely to have an outdoor space.  Chas answered all my many questions with great patience and care...he really wanted us to have a wonderful time and went beyond the call of duty by even sending us links to good places to watch big soccer matches.  The apartment was clean when we arrived and had the basic things we needed such as towels and extra sheets.  While not the cheapest option on BNB it gave us all a wonderful bed to sleep in, space to spread out in when needed, and a fantastic location!  We even found street parking for the full 5 days!  Picking up the keys was a breeze and we left a few basic things for the next guests to enjoy from the corner store.   It is a gorgeous street to stay on and felt very safe. Thank you so much Chas!  We hope to return one day soon."
            },
            {
                "_id": "377728",
                "date": "2011-07-17T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "586633",
                "reviewer_name": "Sheree",
                "comments": "Our stay in New York at this apartment was vastly superior to staying at a hotel.  The location is perfect particularly for those wanting access to Central Park and the museum mile (Guggenheim etc) but it was also a revelation to explore that end of Broadway.  The apartment is lovely and has everything.  We especially appreciated the study nook and ability to use our laptop with wifi access and the well equipped kitchen for easy prep for meals (and deli close by makes it so easy to stock up).  The lounge, bedroom and bathroom are all in good, comfortable condition.  The little balconies and view of the courtyard topped it off.  A great experience and thoroughly recommend."
            },
            {
                "_id": "640995",
                "date": "2011-10-18T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "857069",
                "reviewer_name": "Michele",
                "comments": "After a small glitch with the house keys, which was straightened out straight away, our stay was perfect. The apartment is lovely, in a great neighborhood and right by the subway. Even my husband. who is very picky, gave it a two thumbs up ! Our hosts were attentive and gracious over the emails and the whole thing was easy and pleasant. We'd definitaly book again. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "701775",
                "date": "2011-11-08T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "100034",
                "reviewer_name": "John",
                "comments": "It's hard to imagine a more authentic and enjoyable NYC experience than the one we had staying in this UWS apartment. There are so many details -- from the art on the walls to the spices in the kitchen -- that make it feel like a home away from home. The apartment is small but imminently comfortable with high ceilings and patios that make it feel spacious. The unit is off the street (on a courtyard)  so it was very quiet (that  and the comfortable bed made for great nights of sleeping). It's a beautiful street, just off Central Park and just around the corner from the subway. There are abundant restaurants within a 5 minute walk and the best coffee in NY (Joe's) is only about two blocks away. Chas was a great host who was quick to answer all our questions and make our stay as enjoyable as possible. We had our two sons with us (ages 10 and 12) and the living arrangements were ideal for a family our size. Thanks, Chas!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "809460",
                "date": "2011-12-28T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "1176725",
                "reviewer_name": "Nelson",
                "comments": "We just spent Christmas week at the apartment with our two daughters (aged 2.5 and 1). The space was well stocked and furnished and the location was perfect. It's not a huge apartment but the lofted ceilings give it a nice, open feel. Central Park, the subway, a convenience store, a wine store, and Starbucks are all within a block or two. When I first booked the reservation I was unsure about the process to get the keys, but it turns out I had no reason to be worried whatsoever. It was very easy and worked out well. Chas answered questions promptly and is a great host. We hope to be back soon!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "4211309",
                "date": "2013-04-19T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "4678592",
                "reviewer_name": "Judith",
                "comments": "A great experience - Chas was a good communicator so picking up the key went exactly as planned (a good thing for a first timer!), the apartment was just what we needed and the location (and quiet street) really were fabulous.  "
            },
            {
                "_id": "4993494",
                "date": "2013-06-06T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "5422846",
                "reviewer_name": "Howard",
                "comments": "I don't think we could of asked for the most perfect spot to stay at while visiting NYC. This home is close to everything we wanted to experience while being in the city.... the park, museums, great places to eat at, major subway lines to take you to midtown and lower Manhattan, etc, etc,.  The apartment was so nice, quiet, comfortable, and cool to come back to after being out and about ( we had a couple of days during our stay where it was very warm ) and that was a plus !  Both Paul and Chas were quickly responsive and accommodating to any questions or needs we had. All in all, if you really want to get a great NYC experience, this beautiful UWS retreat is the way to go.  Thank you Chas and Paul !!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "14178785",
                "date": "2014-06-14T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "11195529",
                "reviewer_name": "Phoebe",
                "comments": "My Mum and I recently spent 11 nights at Chas' Upper West Side apartment. We had not used AirBnB before, but the whole process ran very smoothly. Both Chas and Paul were quick at answering emails and provided us with plenty of information re local grocery shops etc. The pick-up of the keys was also very simple. \r\nThe apartment is in a great location, half a block from Central Park and close to several subway lines. Only up one flight of stairs, which was good because there are no lifts! \r\nThe apartment was very well equipped with everything you need for a stay away from home - bedding, towels, full kitchen etc. It was a bit smaller than it appears in the photos and could do with a lick of paint, but was very clean and had plenty of storage. Also, keep in mind that the beds in the loft may provide a bit of a problem for some guests - definitely best for kids. \r\nOverall, we had a great time at Chas' apartment and would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to visit New York! "
            },
            {
                "_id": "15810779",
                "date": "2014-07-16T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "10224851",
                "reviewer_name": "Thomas",
                "comments": "We had a great time in the apartment! Location was great with just steps to Central Park and the subway right around the corner. Would stay here again for sure! Thanks!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "18048829",
                "date": "2014-08-21T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "12469670",
                "reviewer_name": "Hanna",
                "comments": "Our stay in the apartment on 87th St was really wonderful. The neighborhood was cosy and felt safe, the subway was only steps away and it was close both to the park and to the shops and restaurants on Amsterdam and Broadway. It couldn't have been better. The apartment itself was nice and roomy for being in New York, and had everything we needed. The kitchen was small but well equipped and the beds were comfortable. Chas was very helpful and answered all our questions very quickly. Overall, it was a really wonderful stay!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "20738004",
                "date": "2014-10-05T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "16761585",
                "reviewer_name": "Jonathan",
                "comments": "We're grateful to Chas and Paul being were flexible and accommodating with our arrival / departure times and our queries over the first day or so.  \r\nThe description and pictures were accurate and the apartment was well-maintained and very neat and clean.  The mezzanine floor is best suited for storage or sleeping arrangements for children or understanding teens or adults.\r\nThe upper West Side felt very safe at all times and the apartment was on the same block for the subway stops for B and C trains and a short walk to restaurants / cafes on Columbus and Amsterdam.  Overall, the apartment offered a genuine feeling of how it would be to live as a New Yorker, rather than a hotel tourist.  Highly recommended."
            },
            {

                "reviewer_name": "Erich",
                "comments": "We felt like home during a wonderful week in October. I have been to NY repeatedly and I was always reluctant to return because of the hotels which I didn't like at all.                 "reviewer_id": "51393254",
                "reviewer_name": "Janeia",
                "comments": "The apartment was perfect for my first visit to New York and as a first-time Airbnb user. Chas was always quick to respond and very helpful. The images of the apartment are accurate and the Upper West Side area was great - close to Central Park, a heap of stores and restaurants, away from the noise. Would definitely consider staying here again."

                "comments": "Mil gracias Chas por dejarnos compartir tu hermoso apto. Nos hemos sentido como en casa. Muy comodo y confortable, con todo lo necesario para sentirse a gusto.                 "reviewer_id": "35460727",
                "reviewer_name": "Johanna",
                "comments": "The apartment was exactly how we imagined it to be: cosy, but spacious by New York standards. The apartment is located in a beautiful street lined with old Brownstones, so would be perfect for those who prefer a genteel New York neighbourhood rather than an urban, grungy one. It is located a few minutes' walk from the subway and a block back from Central Park. Great spot, and the owners were easy to arrange accommodation with."
            },

            {

                "date": "2016-10-20T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "5139980",
                "reviewer_name": "Alicia",
                "comments": "Paul's place is in such a great location, so close to the subway, shops, cafes and restaurants. Along with a only being a couple of blocks away from the American Museum of Natural History and a short and beautiful walk through Central Park to The Met and the Guggenheim. \r\nThe apartment is as pictured, it's tidy and clean and very comfortable. I couldn't hear any street noise and slept well. \r\nThere's a hairdryer which made my day as well :D\r\nPaul was very responsive to questions I had, and went out of his way to make sure check in was easy. \r\nHighly recommended.  "
            },
            {
                "_id": "122281842",
                "date": "2016-12-22T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "23347287",
                "reviewer_name": "Gisel",
                "comments": "Paul's home is sweet and cozy and warm. It is in a quiet residential building on a lovely tree lined lock on the upper west side; close to the subway and next to  Central Park. If you walk to Columbus Avenue, there are stores and restaurants and also on Amsterdam Avenue and Broadway. Its a great place to stay if you want to enjoy NYC and then come back to a quiet and tranquil retreat. Our host was very communicate regarding the arrangements for acquiring the apartment keys and any questions we had were answered promptly. There is a laundry in the basement of the building which makes it easy to wash and dry your clothes. The Museum of Natural History is close by and so is the NY Historical Society and of course beautiful Central Park and one can walk towards the  Henry Hudson River to Riverside Park.  Overall a lovely and positive experience. Thank you!"
            },

            {

                "date": "2017-03-15T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "20075815",
                "reviewer_name": "Abbie",
                "comments": "Paul and Chas' flat is very warm and welcoming, and perfect for a couple. It is beautifully located right next to Central Park, as well as roads like Columbus, which has ample coffee shops, bars and restaurants. It is also very close to the subway station for easy exploring of other districts like Greenwich Village and Brooklyn. We were able to walk to lower Manhattan (Times Sq, Rockerfella Centre etc). The flat was the perfect cosy place to come back to and watch the snow. We felt very safe and everyone we met in the area was incredibly friendly, particularly Paul and Chas' friend Gail who assisted us with keys and NYC recommendations! We would happily recommend this apartment to any future visitors - we are very sad to leave!"
            },

                "reviewer_id": "74403530",
                "reviewer_name": "Jessica",
                "comments": "Great little apartment in quiet neighbourhood. Barely any traffic noise was heard but the heater was extremely loud and kept us awake at night (centrally controlled).\nThe apartment is very close to lots of great restaurants on Columbus, Amsterdam and Broadway. \nThank you to Chas and his helpers for the excellent communication and great stay!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "145279999",
                "date": "2017-04-17T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "23472160",
                "reviewer_name": "Miranda",
                "comments": "Chas's apartment on the Upper West Side was like staying at a home away from home. Located close to Central Park, and many restaurants just a few blocks over.  Very happy to be so close to the subway which made going downtown very easy. \n\nWe were a couple and extra adult, who slept in the loft. It is a loft (can't stand up) but nice to sleep on a real mattress,  as opposed to fold out sofas like much of the value for money accommodation in New York. \n\nChas was easy to communicate with, and very accommodating as we were able to arrange for us to drop our bags off early before check in so that we could head off and explore. Would stay again in the future, as such great value for money (and doesn't feel like your staying a shoe box, like most of NYC). Would be perfect for families. Thanks! "
            },

                "date": "2017-05-14T04:00:00.000Z",

            },

                "reviewer_name": "Guy",
                "comments": "Nous sommes un couple retraité ,qui avons passé 8 jours à New York dans cet appartement ,avec notre petite-fille de 25 ans qui travaille pendant un an près de New York.\nElle dormait dans la mezzanine à plafond très bas (ce qui ne l'a pas dérangé).\nappartement très agréable ,quoique un peu  sombre ,et très bien placé ( métro et Central Park).\n"

            {

                "reviewer_id": "11428125",
                "reviewer_name": "Merrilee",
                "comments": "This is a great spot - fantastic subway access, great restaurants a few blocks away and Central Park practically across the street.  The apartment is charming, welcoming and easy.  Can't imagine a better way to visit New York."
            },
            {
                "_id": "171641487",
                "date": "2017-07-18T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "102995",
                "reviewer_id": "110495000",
                "reviewer_name": "Heidi",
                "comments": "Great place to stay! Loved the location. Subway one block away. You can see Central Park when you walk out the front door. Riverside park is just a few blocks in the other direction. \nUWS is a great place to stay in the city. I've stayed in UES and Harlem before. UWS and UES is about the same, but this location at UWS is quieter. \n\nFor great restaurants just walk on over to Columbus Av, Amsterdam Av or Broadway and your set. \n\nThe apartment: It was nice, big and homely. The bushes by the little veranda could use some trimming but we didn't have time to use it anyway. \nAC is really good. You leave it off when you go out. Put it on when you get back in and it's nice, and cool in minutes. \nAs indicated, the ceiling in the loft is low. You can't stand up straight. But there's plenty of room up there. \n\nCommunicating with Chas was easy. He always answered my questions quickly. \n\nOverall a great experience! "
            },

            {
                "_id": "5755359",
                "date": "2013-07-15T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1016739",
                "reviewer_id": "6574131",
                "reviewer_name": "Helen",
                "comments": "My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)"
            },
            {

                "listing_id": "1016739",
                "reviewer_id": "36481755",

                "comments": "David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk."
            },

                "comments": "When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big.                 "date": "2013-05-07T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "6061475",
                "reviewer_name": "Silvia",
                "comments": "It was great! \r\nRachael`s cosy home is in the middle of Brooklyn and Rachael is just brilliant, full of joy and energy. Just around the corner there are many nice bars and delis. It is such a nice place to be. On our first day we go for a \"little\"walk from R home to and over the Brooklyn Bridge. You can see and look so much on this walk, perfect. We definetely enjoyed our trip to NY and would ever go back to Rachaels home! \r\nSilvi & Jo"
            },
            {
                "_id": "5081248",
                "date": "2013-06-11T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "5983688",
                "reviewer_name": "Kathrine Bork",
                "comments": "We had 5 wonderful weeks in the cozy brownstone-apartment in Brooklyn. The neighbourhood was amazing, with small cafés etc. with live music and local events on Franklin Ave (Little Zelda's, Cool Pony...), Brooklyn Botanic Garden + Brooklyn Museum + Prospect Park nearby. The apartment had a great kitchen, fully equipped and we sometimes took the dinner with us down to the front stairs on the street. Our room had a small walk-in closet and a bed, we also enjojyed the big living room. Rachael was so sweet. She worked a lot, but we could always ask her about anything. She had a great laughter and we sometimes chit chattet with her in the kitchen. We would definately recommend a stay in this great apartment!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "7288845",
                "date": "2013-09-14T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "1525791",
                "reviewer_name": "Lisanicole",
                "comments": "Rachael was so wonderful! She really makes the effort to make her space friendly and lovely. She so obviously loves where she lives and loves her neighborhood and having others to share it with. It was so much fun and relaxing staying with her and talking about all kinds of things. She's the best and I would happily stay with her again!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "7840236",
                "date": "2013-10-05T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "1645904",
                "reviewer_name": "John",
                "comments": "I couldn't recommend staying in Rachael's house more highly. Rachael was very warm and welcoming and almost always available to ask questions of or even just have a chat with.\r\nThe house is in a really great old Brooklyn neighbourhood with plenty of character and some really great cafes, restaurants and vintage stores springing up just around the corner. The 2,3,4,5 trains are only a few minutes walk away so getting into Manhattan is a breeze.\r\nI look forward to staying back with Rachael again whenever I'm next visiting New York."
            },
            {
                "_id": "9020177",
                "date": "2013-12-02T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "2845999",
                "reviewer_name": "Dorothy",
                "comments": "I really didn't feel that Rachel's room was adequately represented in the listing. It's very much an interior room, not just by a hall and a living room, but also by a staircase, the bathroom and the kitchen. It's in the center of the apartment. The openings are sheet rocked in, so have no insulation. There is no separation from the owner's unit downstairs. What this means is that sound (all sounds, casual sounds, everything)  is completely transparent within the room. I would not recommend for a light sleeper, or for someone who needs to feel a sense of privacy. \r\nI also wrote up front about what I needed. I didn't feel listened to at all. Then I was blamed being for not being up front (apparently because I didn't emphasize that I seriously needed what I needed), and then was also told when I was angry that my communication style is overwhelming. It actually made me feel pretty \"gas lighted.\"\r\nFinally, the apartment is extremely expensive even by NYC standards. My friends who visited me during my month long stay were aghast. They felt that what I was paying for the room was close to what the rent probably was for the whole apartment.\r\n...On the up-side the place is clean, and the neighborhood is great. The landlord downstairs is very nice too. For a few days of visiting if you're not noise sensitive, the apartment could be quite fine if you don't mind the price. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "10120895",
                "date": "2014-02-01T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "4298119",
                "reviewer_name": "Jo",
                "comments": "Rachael is a fabulous host and the apartment is just lovely! First let's talk about the apartment. It's the second and top floor of a brownstone. It's decorated beautifully and she has set aside shelf space in the kitchen and bathroom to allow you to really feel at home. The bedroom is very comfortable, with a large closet and dresser to store your things. The bed is soooooo comfortable! I slept like a rock!\r\n\r\nThe apartment is half a block away from great restaurants and groceries on Franklin Ave and a super short walk to the 2, 3, 4, 5, and S trains, and an easy walk to the A and C trains at Fulton and the LIRR stop at Nostrand Ave which I walked to every morning while I was here. Ask Rachael for recommendations on food. She knows her stuff!\r\n\r\nSpeaking of Rachael, she is one of the nicest people you'll meet in New York City. I had a few problems moving in that were entirely my fault, but she was attentive and helpful far exceeding any expectations. She makes you feel welcome and at home from the minute you arrive and she's a joy to chat with when you have a minute.\r\n\r\nI would highly recommend this room to anyone coming to Brooklyn!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "11744623",
                "date": "2014-04-14T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "2188528",
                "reviewer_name": "Honey",
                "comments": "Staying at Rachael's has been wonderful. The room is spacious, quiet, clean and so comfortable, as is the rest of the house. There is such a relaxing atmosphere here, and i really look forward to coming home at the end of the day. It's just a great place to be. As for Rachael, she is honestly amazing! So warm and funny, and gives you exactly the right amount of space/attention. I highly recommend staying here, and it'll 100 percent be my first choice whenever i return to New York.\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "14489878",
                "date": "2014-06-20T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1068505",
                "reviewer_id": "1476791",

                "reviewer_id": "15084954",
                "reviewer_name": "Matej",
                "comments": "Staying at Rachael's was perfect. I stay at her place two weeks with my brother. She was very nice, kind and always helpful when we needed something.             "host_location": "Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil",
            "host_about": "Trabalho com locações de imóveis mobiliados há 7 anos e AMO ser HOST. \r\nValorizo o conforto acima de tudo e tenho satisfação em buscar meus hóspedes no aeroporto, ajudar com pequenas mudanças; indicar restaurantes ou planejar passeios. Posso ajudar no que for preciso! \nAlém de produtora de locações e mãe, faço trabalhos como curadora de arte e produzo a Organização Socio Cultural “VAGALUME O VERDE  - VOV” cujo BLOCO de CARNAVAL desfila há 14 anos na Rua Jardim Botânico, sempre às terças-feiras de carnaval. \nO VOV  nasceu no Horto Florestal e tem a sustentabilidade e preservação ambiental como diretrizes. Estudamos e pesquisamos diariamente como usar de maneira responsável o que a Natureza nos proporciona e deixar um LEGADO para gerações futuras. \nAlém de equipe de coleta seletiva, plantio de mudas para neutralização do impacto gerado pelo desfile (compensação ambiental), mão de obra local e reutilização de materiais, \nem 2013 Implementamos a norma de certificação da “ISO 20121- Gestão em Eventos Sustentáveis”. \nEm 2015, recebemos o prêmio Serpentina de Ouro, por melhor organização.                 "reviewer_name": "Hein",
                "comments": "Nice apartment! We needed an apartment during carnival and this was perfect. Good bed, bedroom had good AC. Two bathrooms. Big kitchen with huge fridge. Very big balcony. Nice common swimming pool. The neighborhood was even nicer than expected. Right next to the Jardim Botanico, many restaurants in this street and in the Rua Pacheco Leao. The Zona Sul, an upmarket supermarket indeed around the corner (corner Rua Jardim Botanico and Rua Pacheco Leao). We very much liked La Biciclette for breakfast, it is a French bakery on the corner of Rua Pacheco Leao and Rua Von Martius. Also we liked the restaurant SOBE in the Rua Pacheco Leao. Good starters, great view on the Christ as it is partly an open-air restaurant. Roberta and her sister were very nice for us."
            },

            {

                "listing_id": "10570041",
                "reviewer_id": "5735057",
                "reviewer_name": "Stephanie",
                "comments": "We enjoyed our 4-day stay at this apartment, while we were moving house in Rio. The apartment is cute and stocked with everything you need to actually live in it, which I appreciated - good kitchen. Roberta was responsive and accessible. If you're visiting Rio, it's a great base, in a lovely neighbourhood. Two things to keep in mind - it's really quite a small space (standard for Rio, but perhaps a surprise for guests who arrive from outside Brazil) and you hear a lot of street noise, so it's perhaps not ideal for light sleepers. We would stay here again!"

A wide reef along these beaches creates warm pockets for swimming and snorkeling in calm weather.         "reviews": [
            {
                "_id": "15938992",
                "date": "2014-07-18T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "16708857",
                "reviewer_name": "Lisette",
                "comments": "This place was clean, safe, and quiet. It is across the street from Queen's Bath. 10 minute drive to Hanalei Bay. Coral is very sweet and helpful. I definitely recommend staying here."
            },
            {
                "_id": "17133850",
                "date": "2014-08-07T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "19361810",
                "reviewer_name": "Tara",
                "comments": "Coral and Ian were great! They were there to greet us even though it was late! The pools temperature was perfect. The place was beautiful and welcoming. They had everything we needed, and even some snacks and sweets. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "18351835",
                "date": "2014-08-25T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "16192349",
                "reviewer_name": "Alison",
                "comments": "Coral and Ian were very warm and welcoming. \r\nThe room was exactly as listed and extremely comfortable, with more than enough amenities (comfortable bed, full bathroom, use of garden with fresh fruit, pool, beach items, wifi, and laundry) to make my stay very pleasant. \r\nTruly perfectly located on the North Shore in a lovely and quiet neighborhood, walking distance from Hideaway beach (15 minutes) and Queens Bath (1 minute) and an easy drive to local beaches, hikes and sites. \r\nI would certainly stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a quiet, clean, affordable and comfortable room on the North Shore. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "19144637",
                "date": "2014-09-07T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "8206842",
                "reviewer_name": "Malia",
                "comments": "Coral was a welcoming and kind host! She made sure that we had access to things that were essential to our stay and our room was quite tidy.  The room was exactly as listed in the description and was perfectly located. My husband and I would highly recommend staying if your travels lead you to the quaint north shore of Kauai."
            },
            {
                "_id": "20429603",
                "date": "2014-09-29T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "9150242",
                "reviewer_name": "Jennifer",
                "comments": "We had a wonderful time at the Asia House. The room is small, but very clean und comfy. There is everything you need. And Coral is a perfect host. She helps out if needed. The pool is nice to cool down a little. \r\nThanks for having us, Coral!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "21137901",
                "date": "2014-10-12T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "20570134",
                "reviewer_name": "Charlène",
                "comments": "Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Coral. Le logement est dans un quartier calme de Princeville, idéalement situé pour visiter la côte nord de l'île. Il correspond bien au descriptif, pas très grand mais confortable et avec tout le nécessaire. Coral est une hôte gentille, disponible et aidante. Une adresse que nous recommandons."
            },
            {
                "_id": "21703768",
                "date": "2014-10-22T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "3553869",
                "reviewer_name": "Edward",
                "comments": "We stayed for 7 days and enjoyed our stay.     The good: location,  location,  location. Princeville is a desirable place. Coral and Ian are very nice hosts. Entry is completely separate from house. Bed is quite firm, but Coral has a thick foam pad you can use as a topper.   The not as good: If you want to prepare and eat food in your place it is quite small, and the bathroom sink serves double duty."
            },
            {
                "_id": "21976061",
                "date": "2014-10-27T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "22254254",
                "reviewer_name": "Cynthia",
                "comments": "Coral & Ian were very welcoming hosts! We only met them at check-in, but they seemed willing to accommodate further requests if any had come up. The unit is as described- clean, simple & cozy. It offered ample privacy and felt like beach house living. We had an enjoyable & relaxing stay!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "22360842",
                "date": "2014-11-04T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "12745402",
                "reviewer_name": "Zack",
                "comments": "Coral was out of town when we arrived but Ian was able to meet us. They seemed very friendly and down to earth. Coral was able to provide lots of helpful information about the area when we emailed prior to arrival. The rental was just as described and well taken care of. We would definitely stay here again."
            },
            {
                "_id": "22456916",
                "date": "2014-11-07T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "15173359",
                "reviewer_name": "Andreas",
                "comments": "Coral und Ian haben uns sehr herzlich empfangen in ihrem wunderbaren, im asiatischen Stil gebauten Haus. wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt, das Zimmer und der kleine Sitzplatz haben unsere Bedürfnisse perfekt abgedeckt. Die Lage ist sehr ruhig und sicher. Leider haben. wir Coral bei unserer Abreise verpasst. Herzlichen Dank nochmals, auch für die feinen Früchte aus dem Garten."
            },
            {
                "_id": "22706206",
                "date": "2014-11-12T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "13414454",
                "reviewer_name": "Bryan",
                "comments": "Both Coral and Ian are fantastic hosts.  They greeted us when we arrived and an upper room was available, so we decided to upgrade to it during our stay there.  It was a beautiful room in a gorgeous house.  The house really is very impressive and worth a stay there just to see it.  It is literally less than a block away from the trailhead leading to Queen's bath, so it's in a great location.  It's less than 10 minutes drive to Hanalei and about 25 minutes from Ke'e State Park.\r\n\r\nThe room was clean and had all of the things we needed to cook what we wanted while we were there.  There is no air conditioning, but fans are provided.  During the summer months I can imagine the room we stayed in would be quite hot, but it was about perfect in early November.\r\n\r\nI would definitely recommend staying here, and we will be back at some point ourselves."

                "comments": "Coral and her husband Ian were warm and inviting hosts.  Their place was located right in Princeville right across the street from Queens Bath. As I've been to the island many times it allowed me to do everything on the north shore that I wanted to do.  Perfect home base to explore the area from.  Thank you Coral and Ian for a wonderful stay.  Bed was comfortable, fan and trade winds made the nights comfortable, and the welcome basket was delicious and appreciated!"

            {
                "_id": "39325473",
                "date": "2015-07-22T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "37841180",
                "reviewer_name": "Robert",
                "comments": "My wife and I went to the Kauai for my birthday and booked this room at the Asia House.  We wanted to complete the Hanakapi'ai Falls hike on this short visit.\r\nCoral was very quick to respond and offered us accommodation. The hospitality was exceptional and Coral and Ian treated us like family in their home.  \r\nWe were especially grateful for all the amenities that came with this room.  The room had a full size refrigerator that allowed us to chill our water for the hike.  We had a large screen TV, wi-fi, microwave oven, toaster and dishes for use in the room.  In addition, we had access to a cooler to take beverages along with us to the beach, a sun umbrella, beach chairs and many other useful items! Coral also offered my wife an awesome walking stick for the hike to the falls.\r\nAfter the long hike, we came back and treated our sore muscles to the jacuzzi.  There is also a grill if you feel inclined to cook in the courtyard.  \r\nLast, parking was free, and there is direct access (across the street) to Queens Bath which is incredible in the summertime.  \r\n\r\nBe sure to also ask about where to sit back and watch the sunset from the cliff overlooking Queen's bath just a short 2 minute walk from the room.\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "40433082",
                "date": "2015-07-31T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "1775906",
                "reviewer_name": "Bunny",
                "comments": "Our hosts were very welcoming and generous with their home! They gave us fruit from their trees. They were around and willing to help us with whatever we needed. The location is superb. It is a quiet neighborhood but not far from the \"action\" in Hanalei. Their pool was so very refreshing to swim in after a day of being out and about on Kaua'i. There are several beautiful beaches close by! They have everything you need for a great day at the beach. There is only one draw back here. The wifi is very iffy and not available in the room."
            },
            {
                "_id": "41383962",
                "date": "2015-08-07T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "36576846",
                "reviewer_name": "Amy",
                "comments": "Great location, the courtyard was beautiful, fresh flowers in room as well as a goodie basket with snacks and bottled water.  Pictures were all very accurate.  Ian and Coral were very nice and gave us lots of privacy.  Loved having the pool to ourselves every evening.  When booking, I knew we would be close to Queen's Bath but didn't realize that we would be at such an awesome location for sunsets.  The neighborhood was very quiet in the evenings and this is probably the only place we have ever stayed in Kauai that we didn't get woken up by roosters.\r\n\r\nWe stayed in the Garden Room, which got pretty toasty in the evenings with the west sun coming in. This may not be the norm as it was pretty hot on the island the week we were there and it was probably partially our own fault because we were not comfortable sleeping with the door open (nothing to do with the hosts - just my personal comfort level)\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "43810487",
                "date": "2015-08-22T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "39189552",
                "reviewer_name": "Christine",
                "comments": "À notre arrivée, c’est le mari de Coral qui nous a accueilli. Un homme plein d’entrain, de joie de vivre et sympathique comme tout !\r\nSon épouse, Coral est ensuite venue nous dire bonjour et nous faire part de différentes informations.\r\nCe sont des gens remplis de générosité qui nous font partager leur lieu avec grand plaisir.\r\nToujours là pour nous guider dans nos différentes excursions par leurs conseils judicieux.\r\nSon mari venait à l’occasion nous montrer les endroits de la place où voir une coucher de soleil fantastique et où plonger et se baigner à Queen’s Bath qui est juste l’autre côté de la rue. Comme le stationnement est pour seulement 8 autos, nous avions le loisir de profiter de tous ces endroits paradisiaques sans problème.\r\nLa chambre est exactement comme décrit sur Airbnb. Le quartier est tranquille, superbe et riche. \r\nAvec le ventilateur, nous dormions très bien sans avoir chaud. \r\nLa feuille de règlements à l’arrivée est à lire absolument… Elle vous informera sur comment obtenir des rabais au Foodland et aussi pour vous encourager à ne laisser traîner aucune nourriture afin de ne pas attirer les fourmis.\r\nLa piscine avec sa cascade est comme sur les photos… paradisiaque. \r\nCoral nous donne des fruits bien mûrs de son jardin chaque jour à notre grand plaisir. \r\nOn s’y sent accueilli comme si on faisait partie de la famille tout en ayant notre intimité et tranquillité. Coral et Ian font tout pour nous mettre à l’aise et rendre ce séjour heureux. \r\nLorsque nous y sommes allées, Coral était en attente d’un nouveau routeur pour le wi-fi. Elle nous a donc donné le mot de passe de son routeur personnel pour nous permettre d’avoir internet. \r\nC’est un endroit à recommander surtout quand on veut voir le nord de l’île qui est la plus belle partie de l’île selon moi.\r\n"
            },

                "_id": "45378741",
                "date": "2015-09-02T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "34851833",
                "reviewer_name": "Karin",
                "comments": "Coral and Ian are pleasant hosts who give you space to come and go,  do your own thing. You get a little room with bath,  private entrance, separate from the main house,  although all share an open atrium with pool and hot tub.   They allowed us to wash clothes as needed.  They provided some beach equipment.  The only drawback is if you need WiFi, the one they have does not carry to the rooms.  The house location is outside of the 4G networks so communication with the outside is frustrating. While access to Queen's Bath is across the street,  it's a treacherous and muddy hike down the steep slopes without safety provisions.   One sprained ankle and badly scraped back...\nThis would be a lovely place for a winter vacation but is too  uncomfortable  with summer heat. My rating is lower due to the heat issues."

The lovely Japanese-Chinese style house is located in a decent neighbourhood, 10min drive to Hanalei Bay. \nAfter a slippery and muddy hiking on the Kalalau trail, the jacuzzi in the courtyard is a blessing for the calfs and thighs (of course after shower and scrubbing off the mud!).\nTry the breakfast on the nearby St. Regis terrace with its breathtaking view!\nThank you for your hospitality!\n"
            },

                "reviewer_name": "Charles",
                "comments": "What an Amazing trip! Thanks again.\r\nThe house is perfectly located. Right across the street from Queen's bath and within a 10 min drive to beautiful hanalei bay.             {
                "_id": "73100213",
                "date": "2016-05-06T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "57317735",
                "reviewer_name": "Brooke",
                "comments": "A wonderful place to stay!!  We visited Princeville to attend a wedding and were thrilled to have found such great accommodations.  Coral was welcoming when we arrived and was always available for questions during our stay.  We were so busy with the wedding and wish we had time to talk with her more.  We were often up early and out late.  The room had everything we needed and was spacious for the two of us.  It was wonderful that a cooler and beach chairs were available to borrow.  Ben and I highly recommend the place and would certainly stay here again if we visit Princeville again."
            },
            {
                "_id": "75145291",
                "date": "2016-05-19T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "51836907",
                "reviewer_name": "Sarah",
                "comments": "We had a wonderful time staying at Asia house!  Coral and Ian were so welcoming and friendly and the place was beautiful.  We loved waking up and coming home to such beautiful surroundings, with sounds of waves, birds, and frogs, and lovely gardens adding to the serenity.  The room and small \"kitchen\" area fulfilled all our needs for small meals at home, and we were generously offered the use of the grill and house kitchen if we felt inspired to do more.  On lazy days we enjoyed playing scrabble in the courtyard and watching the birds at the coconut feeder.  We loved being across the street from the trail to Queen's bath and had several wonderful sunsets there watching the sea turtles and the endangered shearwaters (our best guess) coming home to roost for the night in the cliff banks.   This was an amazingly good first experience with airbnb."
            },
            {
                "_id": "77933621",
                "date": "2016-06-04T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "47671922",
                "reviewer_name": "Michele",
                "comments": "The Garden Room was the perfect home base for our week of discovering the magical North Shore of Kauai. When we first arrived in the room we found a lovely bouquet of fresh tropical flowers cut from the grounds, including a gardenia, my favorite flower. The room was clean, quiet, comfortable and felt private. Even though the pool and hot tub are in a shared courtyard, whenever we wanted to use them we had them to ourselves. We totally enjoyed our stay in this beautiful location. Coral and Ian were very welcoming and hospitable, yet totally respected our privacy. I really enjoyed photographing the flowers and tropical plants with the gorgeous and unique home as a backdrop. The Queen's Bath was a short hike away and my daughter was thrilled to swim with some sea turtles there! We would definitely return."
            },

                "reviewer_name": "Ankita",
                "comments": "We enjoyed our stay in Princeville at Coral's place! The location is where you want to be if you are exploring the North Shore of Kauai.             {

                "comments": "Coral was fantastic. She left us a welcome basket and gave us fresh fruit from their trees throughout our stay.             {
                "_id": "87511701",
                "date": "2016-07-20T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1069531",
                "reviewer_id": "79159576",
                "reviewer_name": "Paul",
                "comments": "Coral and Ian greeted us warmly upon our arrival and took care to show us our quarters and provided clear instructions on how to use everything in the apartment.  They also shared information about their lovely home, which really might be listed as a Japanese ryokan, and with the hot tub, even an onsen!  The comound (much more than a simple house) is fabulous, with a central courtyard with pool and fountain and designed and built by Ian in a traditional Asian (Japanese) style of architecture, with a delightful Hawai'ian garden with Japanese accents.  The room is comfortable, if un-air-conditioned (but with a fan, it was delightful and no AC noise!) and fully equipped with a full-size refrigerator and all amenities (coffee maker, toaster oven, microwave) on a table one can use to prepare breakfast or snacks.  Bathroom is large and comfortable.  Room has bookshelves full of information on Kaua'i and what to see and do.  Table in the garden is ideal for breakfast or cocktails in the shade after a hot day on the trail or in kayaks or on the beach.  We LOVE this place!"

                "comments": "Coral and Ian provided a wonderful place for us to stay while in Princeville. The Garden room was spacious with a large TV, fridge, and microwave. Everything was as pictured, and the hot tub was really nice to crawl into at the end of a busy day. The location was perfect to visit Queens Bath and was close to shopping areas and restaurants.
