                "listing_id": "117425",
                "reviewer_id": "1907558",
                "reviewer_name": "Debbie",
                "comments": "I spent a delightful week at Willy's hideaway apartment. I call it hideaway because the apt. faces the back of the building and you hear nothing except birds chirping, no street noise. The apartment is very small: essentially the large, airy and lovely bedroom you see in the photo and then a tiny kitchen and bathroom. But it is the perfect setup and the PERFECT location if you want to be in the heart of Brooklyn Heights. There is a desk in the bedroom and an Internet connection (not perfect, but mostly worked) so I was able to get some work done too.  Willy was delightful to interact with - accommodating and prompt. After exchanging mobile numbers, we were able to text back and forth, which is very efficient. The bathroom sink turned out to be completely clogged but Willy got a plumber to fix it the next day. She met the plumber there and dealt with the situation, so it was no trouble at all for us. Definitely recommend."
            },

                "comments": "Willamain is sweet, responsible and unobtrusive.  The location is outstanding, and the neighborhood is ideal.                 "comments": "Lulu's apartment is charming, nicely decorated and convenient. It is right at the heart of beautiful brooklyn heights and close to everything.                 "reviewer_id": "2849185",
                "reviewer_name": "Neil",
                "comments": "Our host was very pleasant, and met us after arranging a time to pick up the keys.  The apartment was clean, and airy, but it does not appear to have A/C.  This might be a problem for some in the summer.  For us it wasn't since it was early spring, and still quite cool outside. The apartment is small, and there is no TV.  If this is important to you, you should know this.  WiFi internet is available."

                "reviewer_id": "8871813",
                "reviewer_name": "Jack",
                "comments": "Willy's place is a clean (very), sunny, comfortable, charming apartment on a great block in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in the city.                 "reviewer_name": "Eric",
                "comments": "Nice small older apartment.  Host responsive, and quickly installed A/C, as well as providing extra towels.  Need to be discreet in relation to other building tenants not a big burden, and I believe a universal factor now when renting in NYC."

                "reviewer_id": "3304438",
                "reviewer_name": "Lance",
                "comments": "Thanks for a great stay in Brooklyn Heights!  The apartment, though a bit smaller then the pictures indicate, was clean, comfortable and in a great location.  The neighborhood was quintessentially Brooklyn - a quiet tree-lined street with churches and brownstones.  We felt absolutely safe at all times and noise was never an issue, even as a neighborhood festival was in full swing out front.  The apartment is an easy walk from the 2, 3 and R lines, with one-stop trips into Manhattan.  The neighborhood itself, though, had plenty to offer: two short blocks to shops, restaurants, bakeries and cafes - and the promenade with amazing views of the skyline.  Willy was outstanding with communication and helpful in getting us acclimated to the neighborhood with restaurant recommendations.  Highly recommend a stay in her wonderful apartment."
            },

                "comments": "The apartment looks smaller than the main picture suggests, once your suitcases are in the bedroom/living room there isn't much room to move around... Having said that the flat is clean, airy and bright and very quiet. The bed and pillows are also super comfortable. We arrived late on a very hot summer's day and somehow the electric plug for the air conditioning unit was missing! Luckily there was a supermarket around the corner so we had to go and buy a new extension lead in order to be able to sleep. We also had to buy toilet paper and soap as there was hardly any in the flat (for the price I was expecting everything to be included). Lulu provided new supplies to her cleaner later in the week. The bathroom works well and Lulu has great pictures around the place and nice old furniture. We had a great stay beside the rocky start. Leafy streets, very close to the water, nice neighborhood. "
            },

                "_id": "45207756",

                "listing_id": "117425",
                "reviewer_id": "42544320",
                "reviewer_name": "Abigail",
                "comments": "Other than the location...this apartment wasn't in good condition. Issues with plumbing and VERY poor AC. The neighbours informed me that a complaint had been lodged to the local authorities because it is believed she does not have a permit to operate as a bnb. ..which explains why she wrote this email to me:\r\n\r\n\"The plumbing is old so take care.\r\nAlso, important note! Please do not speak to anyone in the building or mention Airb&b. If anyone asks your parents are a friends/relatives. I would appreciate it very much if you could be discreet\" ...Red flags went off when I read that, but despite my better judgement I went ahead as I was tired and jet lagged from a long haul flight.\r\n\r\nThere is no TV and the front door doesn't lock securely and has a huge dent in it as if someone had once kicked the door in.\r\n\r\nHer neighbours were always very suspicious of her and told me so. I would advise ANYONE considering this apartment to steer clear...something isn't legal about it."

                "comments": "I truly enjoyed my stay at Lulu's apartment. It's a beautiful and very comfortable place in a perfect location!             {
                "_id": "219561860",
                "date": "2017-12-18T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "117425",
                "reviewer_id": "7659961",
                "reviewer_name": "Tim",
                "comments": "The apartment looked bright and charming, and LuLu couldn't have been nicer, but this was one of the worst rental experiences I've ever had. The apartment is literally falling apart (past leaks have left parts of the ceiling hanging down in the bathroom, and have stained the ceiling in the kitchen); the plumbing is old; the upstairs and downstairs tenants could be clearly heard; the subway that runs underneath the building rattled the walls every 5-10 minutes; the heat was intermittent --  the list of grievances could go on, but the final straw came when brown water started pouring out of a rusted pipe in the bedroom ceiling, and began dripping down the walls onto the floor. With no super in sight, and the heat out, and I had no choice but to find a new rental late that night. On the plus side, LuLu was very apologetic, and my money was refunded for the ensuing rental period."
            },

                "listing_id": "117425",
                "reviewer_id": "14280685",
                "reviewer_name": "Esperanza",
                "comments": "Buena ubicación en Brooklyn, barrio bonito y bien comunicado aunque no deja de estar a 40 minutos de la mayoría de los puntos turísticos pero el puente está a unos 15. El apartamento es pequeño, bien para una pareja. Decoración coqueta pero el equipamiento está bastante viejo: sábanas, edredón, almohadas y puerta de entrada que casi no cierra. La comunicación con la anfitriona no ha sido todo lo fluida que debería. Me quiso cambiar la reserva varias veces y luego tardaba más de 15 días en responder o directamente no respondía. Creo que debería ser más seria, a veces da la sensación que se desentiende por completo. Además  si te molestan los ruidos, ten en cuenta que el edificio es muy viejo y se oye todo. Los vecinos de arriba nos tuvieron sin dormir por sus continuas fiestas más de una noche pero por lo demás, es un alojamiento correcto teniendo en cuenta que se trata de Nueva York. "

                "reviewer_id": "28562109",
                "reviewer_name": "Karen",
                "comments": "Thank you for sharing your apartment with us! It was very comfortable -- and perfect for our group of three. Elisabet and Cesc were very nice to work with. When we arrived (a little tired from the travel), Elisabet was very helpful in showing us the apartment. I found the larger bedroom great for sleeping -- back from the street and therefore nice and quiet. We enjoyed sitting in the living room together after a long day of walking and sightseeing. This was my first time using an airbnb apartment and I enjoyed feeling I was \"at home\" rather than at a hotel. I also really liked the neighbourhood. I felt that I was living among the locals and enjoyed picking up coffee in the local pastry shops. Although the apartment is located pretty close to the Sagrada Familia, I didn't feel I was in a touristy area. The apartment is very close to a couple of metro lines, and we used the metro a lot.                 "reviewer_id": "5391657",
                "reviewer_name": "Emma",
                "comments": "Great cozy apartment very close to the Sagrada Familia but also in a quiet neighborhood. Perfect for a couple of days of sightseeing and eating out. The beds are nice and firm, the bathroom is small but completely outfitted, and the place was incredibly clean. It might be more difficult for those staying longer who want to cook a lot at home. There's a great tapas place around the corner called Firo Tast. So good, and pretty reasonable! Also, I was visiting BCN with my dad, who arrived on an earlier flight than me, and Elisabet and Cesc were both very accommodating about meeting him when he arrived. \n\n"

            {

                "reviewer_id": "57472026",
                "reviewer_name": "Judith",
                "comments": "Elisabet met us at the doorway to the apartment, over an hour late. We had trouble figuring out the buses, and didn't arrive on time. We had a cute little elevator, and the apartment was on the second floor, with little balconies front and back. We were able to make ourselves at home, and enjoyed the little kitchen, two bedrooms and the location was terrific. The apartment was clean, and relatively quiet at night. We felt good about being at the place, and Elisabet had reassured us that if we were to need something we could call. The apartment is furnished with linens and a towel each, and while simple and spartan, had most everything we could want. We enjoyed a lovely week there. We were not 5 people, and I would hesitate to put five people in, with two on the pull out, but it could be done. We loved the outdoor evening activities, so lively, within walking, and the  close and convenient bus service that Barcelona offers."

The apartment itself was clean and spacious enough for all our needs - the living room with the balcony doors opening up to the streets outside was our favourite. There were no surprises - everything was as it appears in the pictures. The location was great - a super short walk to one metro station literally just around the corner, and a five minute walk to two others. Good bus connections in the area as well. Supermarkets and bakeries right across the street, so we could wake up every day and go buy fresh bread for our breakfast. We would definitely recommend it to everyone looking for a clean, comfortable place in a central location."
            },

                "comments": "This is a convenient location to explore Barcelona. Neat, tidy and cute, rustic as in description. We had four people which could be accommodated but it is more ideal for two or three especially as bathroom/toilet is very small.\n\nThere was no spare toilet paper and we couldn't find the sheeting for fourth person but Elisabet and Cesc responded very quickly to all our queries and sheeting was provided within in an hour.\n\nWifi access was really easy and good and this was helpful, flexibility was provided with leaving luggage in the apartment after check out time and hosts checked in to make sure we arrived and got in safely.\n\nThere is lift access to the apartment but please note the lift is very small ie can only fit one large suitcase and one person at one time! \n\nOverall, it was a very good value stay and met our needs in a nice area and handy location to amenities, restaurants shops, tourist sites and public transport with communicative hosts in Elisabet and Cesc."

                "reviewer_name": "Bob&Betty",
                "comments": "This is a perfectly located apartment in an historic building, which provided gorgeous hardwood floors, a beautiful brick ceiling, and natural air flow from the double balconies.  The living room balcony opens to the street, with the accompanying street noise, which we loved during the day, and closed out at night.             {
                "_id": "233382402",
                "date": "2018-02-09T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "64335584",
                "reviewer_name": "Cornelia",
                "comments": "Ich mag es absolut nicht, schlechte Bewertungen abzugeben, doch in diesem Fall bin ich gezwungen! Das war die siebte Unterkunft in Folge, auf unserer Spanienreise. Die Wohnung von Elisabet ist eine Absteige und das Geld nicht wert! Wir sind sehr enttäuscht und haben die Unterkunft nach einer Nacht verlassen, obwohl wir 3 Nächte bezahlt haben. Es roch unheimlich penetrant und durchdringend nach künstlichem „Jasminduft“, wohl von einem überdosierten Raumspray..! Grauenhaft! Die Wohnung verfügt zwar über eine Klimaanlage im Wohnzimmer und über je einen portablen Heizkörper in den Schlafzimmern, doch war es nicht möglich, diese auf eine angenehme Zimmertemperatur zu kriegen, es war deutlich unter 20 Grad Celsius, für Februar ein NO GO! Die Sauberkeit allgemein lässt zu wünschen übrig. Die Küche war schmuddelig, die Frottétücher zwar gewaschen aber stinkig. Vorhänge und Sofaüberwurf haben ebenfalls schlecht gerochen. Überall viel Staub unter den Betten, in den Ecken und unter dem Fernsehmöbel, hier wurde, wenn überhaupt, nur sehr oberflächlich gereinigt! Auf den Fotos im Inserat wird geflunkert. Die Fenster im Zimmer mit einem Bett, der Küche, dem Bad und dem Entree gehen in das Treppenhaus, es gibt also kein Tageslicht und keine Luft. Was an dieser Unterkunft gut ist, ist die Lage und das WLAN. Zusammengefasst, ein Flop, nicht empfehlenswert."
            },

                "reviewer_name": "Katrin",
                "comments": "Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen und gut erreichbar. Die Wohnung war für unsere Bedürfnisse ausreichend eingerichtet und mit allen wichtigen Utensilien ausgestattet; die beiden Balkone liegen sowohl zur Straßenseite als auch zum ruhigen Hof hin, so dass gut gelüftet werden kann. Zur Zeit ist nebenan eine Baustelle und daher mit Baulärm zu rechnen. Barcelona ist eine tolle Stadt mit tollen Menschen und lässt sich auch zu Fuß gut erkunden; unser Tipp: jenseits der Touristenattraktionen durch die Viertel oberhalb von Eixample schlendern und entspannen."

                "reviewer_id": "40631329",
                "reviewer_name": "Ali",
                "comments": "Elisabet and Cesc's place is just as advertised; a beautiful apartment with nice art and touches (amazing brick ceiling!!) and the perfect amount of space for a couple or even a group of 4+ friends!                 "comments": "This bright and cozy apartment in a peaceful neighborhood of Gracia was the perfect home base for our first trip in Barcelona. The apartment is a few minutes walking distance to two Metro stops (less than 5 minutes walk to L5 metro; about 10-minute walk to L2 metro). Cesc was a wonderful host who helped us get settled in and was super responsive to our questions. Would definitely come back for a future stay!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "356456803",
                "date": "2018-12-08T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "64707694",
                "reviewer_name": "Jennifer",
                "comments": "Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement d'Elisabet et de Cesc. Cesc nous a accueilli en personne et nous a donné des adresses locales et des bons conseils sur la ville. Ils ont été très arrangeants et accueillants. L'appartement et son équipement étaient conformes à leur description. Tout était propre. Le quartier était parfait pour nous qui voyagions avec un bébé car plus au calme. Un peu excentré si on veut faire le tout à pied. Sinon le métro est juste à côté de l'immeuble. L'isolation de l'appartement en terme de bruit et de température est conforme à celle en Espagne donc pas très bonne, mais sans surprise car c'est la réalité du pays.\nMerci Elisabet et Cesc !"
            },
            {
                "_id": "359610173",
                "date": "2018-12-17T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "66256017",
                "reviewer_name": "Yung Yee",
                "comments": "I am happy with the location of this apartment as the metro is within 3 minutes away & is just a few stops away to Barcelona town central like la rambla."
            },
            {
                "_id": "361293677",
                "date": "2018-12-23T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "207354370",
                "reviewer_name": "Nora",
                "comments": "Such a great space beautiful and modern. Perfect for me and my friend! We met Cesc who was very nice and helpful. Front and back balconies are amazing too, view of street and then a private balcony in the back. All amenities provided! Location is good, right by La Sagrada Familia. I would 10/10 recommend this Air BnB! :)"
            },
            {
                "_id": "364229069",
                "date": "2018-12-30T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "4288510",
                "reviewer_name": "Diego",
                "comments": "Excelente piso muy bien ubicado. Cesc y Élisabet muy atentos y amables."
            },
            {
                "_id": "365337855",
                "date": "2019-01-01T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "32461520",
                "reviewer_name": "Qianying",
                "comments": "The location is fantastic and convenient! 10-mintues walk to Sagrada Familia; restaurants, coffee shops and bakery around. The flat is tidy, comfort and a little bit Spanish style. Elisabet is very friendly and helpful. We did have a great time here, and I would definitely recommend it to friends whoever wants to visit Barcelona."
            },
            {
                "_id": "400878733",
                "date": "2019-01-13T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "153928871",
                "reviewer_name": "Amanda",
                "comments": "Our stay In Elisabet’s place was amazing! She was very helpful the whole time and was always answering any questions we had about Barcelona. The place was very big and was perfect for the 3 of us. Highly recommend."
            },
            {
                "_id": "405514289",
                "date": "2019-01-27T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "172843388",
                "reviewer_name": "Lynell",
                "comments": "Elisabet & Cesc are wonderful hosts! They are very communicative and care about the quality of your stay very much. The space is lovely and comfortable. The location couldn’t be better! Only minutes from the Sagrada Familia and steps from public transportation. The neighborhood is safe, which was important to me. The location and comfort of the space really helped us get the most out of our stay in Barcelona! This home is a great value for the location. I’d highly recommend a stay here!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "410572388",
                "date": "2019-02-10T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "58045588",
                "reviewer_name": "Matthew",
                "comments": "Great location and wonderful neighborhood. I was traveling with my mother and the apartment has easy access and great views. Really a perfect space to stay in Barcelona."
            },
            {
                "_id": "411678160",
                "date": "2019-02-13T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "7343512",
                "reviewer_name": "Kimberly",
                "comments": "We arrived in Barcelona earlier than check in, so we found a great place called Barcelona Locker where you can drop off your luggage for a small fee to travel the city. We had great communication with the hosts, so finding the keys and the place was easy. \nThe apartment looks like the pictures, and the location is great for  visiting Sagrada Família and walking to restaurants. I loved the small balcony to view the city life. The bedroom was in the back so it was quiet. It was a little cold because it was winter (Feb.), but they had portable heaters in every room. They provide travel books and maps with recommendations. They are a quick phone call away if you have any questions. \nOverall, we enjoyed our first trip to Barcelona."
            },
            {
                "_id": "412686975",
                "date": "2019-02-16T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "46172191",
                "reviewer_name": "Jordan",
                "comments": "Our stay at Cesc's and Elisabet's place in Barcelona was lovely, with everything we needed in the flat.\n\nThe flat is accurately depicted in the images: modest, clean but compact. \n\nWe had some trouble with the key on arrival but Cesc, despite it being 10pm, quickly came over to help reposition the lock, explaining that the issue was probably because the locks had been changed recently.\n\nWe happily recommend Cesc's and Elisabet's place, and it deserves 5 stars. That said, you should know:\n- the location is fine for getting around and there are nice bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby but if you haven't been to Barcelona before and money isn't much of an issue, the Gothic Quarter is probably the best place to stay\n- the flat interior is nice but the building that the flat is in isn't great, just to manage your expectations!\n- everything in the flat is well thought out, which it has to be because of the small space. Just beware if you are clumsy like me! I was too heavy handed with some things but thankfully nothing was broken in the end"
            },
            {
                "_id": "415714112",
                "date": "2019-02-23T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "204822091",
                "reviewer_name": "Rob",
                "comments": "Fantastic location and very helpful hosts."
            },
            {
                "_id": "416818318",
                "date": "2019-02-25T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "43787987",
                "reviewer_name": "Amy",
                "comments": "Lovely apartment in a great location. Cesc was very helpful to us upon arrival. Really enjoyed our stay."
            },
            {
                "_id": "419090062",
                "date": "2019-03-03T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "1215049",
                "reviewer_id": "162711896",
                "reviewer_name": "Coltrane",
                "comments": "Amazing stay!"
            }
        ]
    }

item.description: This is the schema for the AirBnB Route implemented to query the sample AirBnB mongodb dataset

response.name: Successful Operation
response.body:
Return to Homepage

API Documentation

This page will document the basics of the API that has been constructed.

Sample AirBnB API

The data contained in this API is provided by MongoDB as part of their sample datasets.

This API route will return a list of Sample AirBnB Listings from an example dataset provided by MongoDB.

Currently, it is set to return only 1 (one) AirBnB document, as to provide a basic starting point to build the various API endpoints that will eventually be created.

item.name: A basic function to return the server status

request.description: A basic attempt to determine whether or not the server is either online or could be accessed
